Docs.summary: Provides general framework APIs and application model APIs, and a variety of support classes that are commonly used by many different feature areas.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This namespace documentation contains only .NET projections of Windows Runtime (WinRT) types where the projection differs from the WinRT type. To see the complete list of types for this namespace, see [Windows.UI.Xaml](https://docs.microsoft.com/uwp/api/windows.ui.xaml) in the UWP API reference.
